column2: This chapter contains content to do with Medicine and viruses

column1: Why is it important to know about the field of medicine to do with viruses? (Coronavirus Flashcards)
What are common ways for testing if someone is infected? (Coronavirus Flashcards)
What are the ways to test if someone has immunity to a disease? (Coronavirus Flashcards)
What is the process for testing the efficacy of a vaccine? (Coronavirus Flashcards)
How are vaccines commonly verified as safe to be used? (Coronavirus Flashcards)
How does an immune system tackle an infection due to a virus? (Coronavirus Flashcards)
